query.SelectAny: SELECT userid, roleid, createdby, createdate FROM userroles WHERE ?? = ?
query.SelectAll: SELECT userid, roleid, createdby, createdate FROM userroles
query.SelectById: SELECT userid, roleid, createdby, createdate FROM userroles WHERE id = ?
query.Paging: SELECT userid, roleid, createdby, createdate FROM userroles ORDER BY ?? LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
query.SelectCount: SELECT COUNT(*) as itemamount FROM userroles
query.SelectCountAny: SELECT COUNT(*) as itemamount FROM userroles WHERE {condition}
